ComicInfo.Summary:
At the age of sixteen and on the anniversary of her mother’s death, Sabrina inherits powers that will change her young life forever.
Angry, rebellious, sixteen, and just all around hating the world. That is how Sabrina is When she wakes one day to discover she has just become the new possessor of the family secret. An ancient power past down through the generations and making its way to America by way of the slave trade. She only has a short time to learn its potential and how to control it before she, herself will be hunted down like many of her ancestors. Killed by beings older than the earth, who wish to regain the lost power and reshape the universe to destroy all life. Sabrina has just become all of creation’s last hope.
